title: Knudsen Cool and Creamy Vegetable Dip
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese, softened
6 cups cut-up mixed fresh vegetables (carrot sticks, red pepper strips, celery sticks)
instructions:
Mix first 4 ingredients until well blended.
Top with tomatoes. Serve with cut up vegetables.
